Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Alif-Laam-Raa (edde faxem Yalli Yaaxige) amah baxxaqa iyya kitaabih aayootay Yalli calaalii kee caraamu baxxaqa elle hee kinni
Diggah nanu ama Qhuraan Qarab afat kaa oobisne kaak maqna taaxigeeniih kas elle geytaanankeh

Nabiyow nanu ama Qhuraanay wacyih kol oobisneh addal xaaguk yayse xaagu kol maaqnaah koh warisna, atu ama Qhuraan kol oobisnak naharat tama xaagittek garcit suge marih loowot sugteeh atu tu teekik aaxige kalah
Nabii Mucammadow! isi marah cus, Nabii Yuusuf isi abbak: Yabbaw anu diggah soonol taban kee inki cutuktaay ayroo kee alsa yoh kummaatah ken uble iyye wagqdi

Nabii Yaq-qhuub isi baxa Yuusufuk: yi baxaw tama isi soono isi toobokol ma maaqin, toysa usun koo elle qidan innah uma malah koh malseloonuk, diggah sheytan seehadaytuh qaduwwiy qadaawat kak baxxaqqa iyye kinnik kaak iyye

yi baxaw ku Rabbi ama soono koo kah yuybulle innaah nubuwwannuh koo doorele, sinam table soonoona elle tafdige inna koo barsele, Yalli nubuwwanni niqmat koo kee Nabii Yaq-qhuub samadah duudusele, tahak duma ku namma abba Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii iscaaqhah nubuwwanni niqmat keenih kah duuduse innah, diggah ku Rabbi isi naqoosak nubuwwannuh doora mara yaaxigi, usuk naggaaraay kullim laaracat haa Rabbi kinni kaak iyye
